nodes.text: Forrod was a Twi'lek female who was a doctor and archaeologist of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War.

In 3640 BBY Forrod and her team came to Voss to study local culture and made camp at the Republic Ken-La Outpost. One day, the group detected strange transmissions and all but Forrod went to investigate. Several days after they have not returned, Forrod tasked a Republic citizen to investigate and find out what happened to her team. Turned out, the transmission was fake, a trap by the Imperial forces, who slaughtered Forrod's team to the last.
